Header.name: Andres Felipe Ospina Gualteros
Header.profile: Developer with a passion for blockchain technology, committed to developing innovative solutions and staying up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in the industry.

data.jobDescription:
Develop and maintain trading tools using Python and React.
Optimize code and improve performance to ensure timely processing of data.
Lead a team of developers on project development, providing guidance and mentorship.
Ensure adherence to best practices in software development, including code review, testing, and documentation.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and solve technical challenges.

Worked on a marketplace application using React, Django, and Node.js. Followed and took requirements from stakeholders to build a scalable and reliable application. Set up pipelines for continuous integration using Jenkins to ensure streamlined and efficient development process
- Worked with the development team to implement best practices and ensure high-quality code delivery. Maintained and updated the application as required

Joined a research group with a focus on blockchain technology. Contributed to various exciting projects in the group. Created mocks for use cases and implementations in Hyperledger, Multichain, and Solidity. Gained valuable experience in blockchain technology. Developed several innovative projects as a result of the work. Collaborated with a talented team of researchers and developers throughout the process

data.name: Course Blockchain development with Hyperledger Fabric
Solidity, Blockchain and Smart Contracts with JS
